abstract: DealBook Online; Royal Bank of Scotland says it plans to further cut its stake in Citizens Financial Group.
lead_paragraph: The British bank intends to sell 115 million shares in Citizens Financial Group, equal to a 21 percent stake, after its spinoff last year.

headline.main: R.B.S. to Further Reduce Stake in Citizens Financial

snippet: The British bank intends to sell 115 million shares in Citizens Financial Group, equal to a 21 percent stake, after its spinoff last year.
